Even as the trio of =
Cybertronians enter the room, it shudders slightly as subteranian tremors t=

 pools in this room. 

However the shuddering also reveals several exits fr=
om this place that were previously hidden. One large one that leads on a ra=
ther direct route to the surface, but this one is largely filled with Magma=
 as it is low to the gound. However another, which is still partially cover=
ed by debris leads off in a different direction. 

Despite the destruction =
of this chamber, this second tunnel appears to be more recently excavated, =
and the debris nearly covering its entrance=A0is shielding it from the flow=
 of Magma, keeping it largely clear. This tunnel leads in the same directio=
n that Megatron had discerned the Decepticon and Predicon energy signatures=
